Class BackUpFileService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.util.BackUpFileService

  • public class BackUpFileService
extends java.lang.Object
    This file is used to maintain the back up file at every plugin level.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
